desc: Plantastic Products Plastic from Plants #PLASTICFROMPLANTS Corn Starch Eco Friendly Compostable Biodegradable Drinking Straws, bags and other products, Thailand. Wholesale and Retail Custom Printed Eco Friendly Compostable Straws. Better than Bamboo straws and paper straws.

layout.text: PLASTIC ALTERNATIVES THAT DON'T COST THE EARTH.
Plantastic Products are dedicated to easing the problem of oil based plastic pollution with sustainable, convenient, biodegradable, eco friendly alternatives.
